name: Down The Rabbit Hole

config_properties.name: Down The Rabbit Hole
config_properties.description: A boutique music and arts festival in Beuningen, Netherlands, known for its eclectic lineup and intimate atmosphere.

ai_profile:
**Down The Rabbit Hole 2026: A Fusion of Sounds and Cultures**

This yearâ€™s *Down The Rabbit Hole* festival brings together a carefully curated lineup of 39 artists that span an impressive array of genres, from the pulsating beats of electronic and techno to the soul-stirring melodies of folk, indie rock, and hip-hop. With electronic acts leading the charge at seven performers and a strong showing for indie rock and folk (five each), the festival promises a rich blend of sounds, peppered with unique styles like Anatolian rock, molam, and Italo disco. Diversity is at the heart of this year's event, with artists representing 15 different countries, including the United Kingdom, the United States, the Netherlands, and further afield, like Thailand, DR Congo, and Turkey.

The festival continues to champion inclusivity, showcasing a balance of male (20), female (10), and mixed-gender (4) acts, while also featuring nine artists of color. This commitment to diversity is reflected in both the lineup and the genres on offer, with a mix of global influences like Afropop, jazz rap, and traditional Irish music alongside more mainstream offerings like pop, rock, and indie. With three DJs in the mix, the festival also caters to dance music enthusiasts, ensuring a vibrant and energetic atmosphere.

With an impressive average artist rating of 7.61 and a significant number of highly-rated acts (13 receiving 8 or above), the 2026 edition of *Down The Rabbit Hole* promises an unforgettable experience for music lovers. From chart-topping favorites to experimental pioneers, every artist has been handpicked to take attendees on a genre-spanning, globe-trotting musical journey. With Spotify links available for all acts, fans can dive into the sounds of the festival ahead of time and get ready to be swept away.
